scripts.benchmark-all-cleanup: TS="$(date "+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S")"; node --expose-gc benchmark.js EasyList $TS --cleanup && node --expose-gc benchmark.js EasyList+AA $TS node --expose-gc benchmark.js All $TS --dt
scripts.benchmark: TS="$(date "+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S")"; node --expose-gc benchmark.js EasyList $TS  && node --expose-gc benchmark.js EasyList+AA $TS && node --expose-gc benchmark.js All $TS --dt
scripts.benchmark-save: TS="$(date "+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S")"; node --expose-gc benchmark.js EasyList $TS --save && node --expose-gc benchmark.js EasyList+AA $TS --save && node --expose-gc benchmark.js All $TS --save --dt
scripts.benchmark-compare: TS="$(date "+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S")"; node --expose-gc benchmark.js EasyList $TS && node --expose-gc benchmark.js EasyList+AA $TS && node --expose-gc benchmark.js All $TS --compare --dt
scripts.minify: mkdir -p dist && node minify.js && cp -R lib/content dist
scripts.test:dist: npm run minify && LIB_FOLDER=dist node test_runner.mjs
